## ðŸ”’ Security Vulnerabilities - Neuropilot-project

**Data Source:** Real Trivy scan results from pipeline

### **Vulnerability Count:**
- **Total:** `sum(security_vulnerabilities_total{repository="Neuropilot-project"})`
- **Critical:** `sum(security_vulnerabilities_total{repository="Neuropilot-project",severity="critical"})`
- **High:** `sum(security_vulnerabilities_total{repository="Neuropilot-project",severity="high"})`
- **Medium:** `sum(security_vulnerabilities_total{repository="Neuropilot-project",severity="medium"})`
- **Low:** `sum(security_vulnerabilities_total{repository="Neuropilot-project",severity="low"})`

### **Latest Vulnerabilities:**
*Vulnerabilities are updated from actual pipeline scans*

## ðŸ“Š Code Quality Metrics - Neuropilot-project

**Data Source:** Real code analysis from pipeline

### **Quality Metrics:**
- **TODO Comments:** `sum(code_quality_todos_total{repository="Neuropilot-project"})`
- **Debug Statements:** `sum(code_quality_debug_statements_total{repository="Neuropilot-project"})`
- **Large Files:** `sum(code_quality_large_files_total{repository="Neuropilot-project"})`
- **Total Issues:** `sum(code_quality_total_issues{repository="Neuropilot-project"})`

### **Priority Breakdown:**
- **High Priority:** `sum(code_quality_high_priority_total{repository="Neuropilot-project"})`
- **Medium Priority:** `sum(code_quality_medium_priority_total{repository="Neuropilot-project"})`
- **Low Priority:** `sum(code_quality_low_priority_total{repository="Neuropilot-project"})`

---
**Repository:** Neuropilot-project | **Scan Time:** 2025-10-14 11:33:00 UTC
**Data Source:** Real code analysis results

## ðŸ“ˆ Pipeline Metrics - Neuropilot-project

**Data Source:** Real pipeline execution data

### **Execution Metrics:**
- **Last Run Duration:** `max(pipeline_duration_seconds{repository="Neuropilot-project"})` seconds
- **Average Duration:** `avg(pipeline_duration_seconds{repository="Neuropilot-project"})` seconds
- **Success Rate:** `(sum(pipeline_runs_total{repository="Neuropilot-project",status="success"}) / sum(pipeline_runs_total{repository="Neuropilot-project"})) * 100`%

### **Repository Stats:**
- **Files Scanned:** `sum(repository_files_total{repository="Neuropilot-project"})`
- **Lines of Code:** `sum(repository_lines_total{repository="Neuropilot-project"})`
- **Repository Size:** `max(repository_size_bytes{repository="Neuropilot-project"})` bytes

---
**Repository:** Neuropilot-project | **Last Updated:** 2025-10-14 11:33:00 UTC

## ðŸš€ Live Pipeline Status - Neuropilot-project

**Data Source:** Real-time pipeline monitoring

### **Current Status:**
- **Pipeline Running:** `pipeline_status{repository="Neuropilot-project"}`
- **Last Run:** `max(pipeline_last_run_timestamp{repository="Neuropilot-project"})`
- **Next Scheduled:** `pipeline_next_run_timestamp{repository="Neuropilot-project"}`

### **Performance:**
- **Average Build Time:** `avg(pipeline_build_duration_seconds{repository="Neuropilot-project"})` seconds
- **Average Test Time:** `avg(pipeline_test_duration_seconds{repository="Neuropilot-project"})` seconds
- **Average Scan Time:** `avg(pipeline_scan_duration_seconds{repository="Neuropilot-project"})` seconds

### **Trends:**
- **Runs Today:** `sum(increase(pipeline_runs_total{repository="Neuropilot-project"}[1d]))`
- **Success Rate Today:** `(sum(increase(pipeline_runs_total{repository="Neuropilot-project",status="success"}[1d])) / sum(increase(pipeline_runs_total{repository="Neuropilot-project"}[1d]))) * 100`%

---
**Repository:** Neuropilot-project | **Real-time Data**
